about.title: About Quran.us.kg App
about.description: Quran.us.kg is an open-source Quran app built to offer an ideal listening experience across all platforms. The app is built using modern web technologies to ensure:
about.feature.responsive: Responsive design for all screen sizes
about.mission: The app aims to provide an accessible and permanent source for the Holy Quran while maintaining the highest technical and design standards.
about.servers.title: mp3quran Servers
about.servers.description1: The app uses high-quality Quran audio files provided by mp3quran, a third-party independent service. This ensures fast and stable loading, enabling users to listen to recitations without interruption.
about.servers.description2: We emphasize that mp3quran is not part of our services. It is an external provider supporting millions of users worldwide with a vast and diverse audio library.
privacy.title: Quran.us.kg Privacy Policy
privacy.section1.title: Your Privacy Matters to Us
privacy.section1.body: At Quran.us.kg, we take your privacy seriously. This policy outlines our approach to privacy and data collection in the app.
privacy.section2.title: What Information Do We Collect?
privacy.section2.body: The Quran.us.kg app does not collect any personal information or other user data. The app runs entirely offline, and no data is transmitted from your device.
privacy.section3.title: Why Don’t We Collect Data?
privacy.section3.point1: To provide a seamless offline experience
privacy.section3.point2: No need for analytics or tracking data
privacy.section4.title: We Respect Your Children’s Privacy
privacy.section4.body: Quran.us.kg is designed for children aged 6 and up who can read Arabic. We are committed to protecting children's privacy. Since our app collects no data, children’s information is entirely safe.
privacy.section5.title: Keeping Your Data Secure
privacy.section5.body: As we collect no data, there is no personal information to protect. However, we continue to prioritize app security by regularly monitoring for potential vulnerabilities.
privacy.section6.title: Your Privacy Rights
privacy.section6.body: Since no personal data is collected, there is no need for deletion requests or managing personal information within the app.
privacy.section7.title: Third-Party Services
privacy.section7.body: Quran.us.kg does not use any third-party services for analytics, tracking, or data collection. The app works entirely on your device without sending any information externally.
